subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Top-seeded Nikolay Davydenko overcame a thigh injury to beat the defending champion Juan Mónaco, 6-2, 2-6, 6-2, and win the Hypo Group International in Pörtschach, Austria, for a third time. It was Davydenko’s 13th ATP Tour title and second of the season; he won the Masters Series event in Miami last month.
